name: Actor
description:
An Actor is an object which can be spawned and destroyed through Lua.
Actors support 3D transformations such as translation (location), rotation, and scale.

An Actor is the base for several entities, and all those entities share the same Methods and Events described in this page.

functions.name: AddImpulse
functions.description: Applies a force in world world to this Actor
functions.description_long: Applies a force in world world to this Actor (the force is applied client side, by, in most cases, the player closest to this Actor)

functions.name: AttachTo
functions.description: Attaches this Actor to any other Actor, optionally at a specific bone

parameters.name: bone_name
parameters.description: Which bone to attach to. If empty it will be attached to the Actor, otherwise to the Mesh at the bone/socket

parameters.name: lifespan_when_detached
parameters.description: Seconds before destroying this Actor when detached, setting it to 0 will automatically destroy this actor when detached, setting it to 10 will destroy this after 10 seconds when detached

parameters.name: use_absolute_rotation
parameters.description: Whether to force attached object to use absolute rotation (will not follow parent)

functions.name: Detach
functions.description: Detaches this Actor from AttachedTo Actor

functions.name: SetCollision
functions.description: Sets this Actor's collision type

functions.name: SetDimension
functions.description: Sets this Actor's Dimension

functions.name: SetForce
functions.description: Adds a permanent force to this Actor, set to Vector(0, 0, 0) to cancel

parameters.name: is_local
parameters.description: Whether to apply the force in local space

functions.name: SetGravityEnabled
functions.description: Sets whether gravity is enabled on this Actor

functions.name: SetVisibility
functions.description: Sets whether the actor is visible or not

functions.name: GetSocketTransform
functions.description: Gets a Socket Transform in world space given a bone or socket name

functions.name: SetHighlightEnabled
functions.description: Sets whether the highlight is enabled on this Actor, and which highlight index to use
functions.description_long: Sets whether the highlight is enabled on this Actor, and which highlight index to use. This will apply the highlight on every attached entity too

functions.name: SetOutlineEnabled
functions.description: Sets whether the outline is enabled on this Actor, and which outline index to use
functions.description_long: Sets whether the outline is enabled on this Actor, and which outline index to use. This will apply the outline on every attached entity too

functions.name: SetLifeSpan
functions.description: Sets the time (in seconds) before this Actor is destroyed. After this time has passed, the actor will be automatically destroyed.

functions.name: SetLocation
functions.description: Sets this Actor's location in the game world

functions.name: SetRotation
functions.description: Sets this Actor's rotation in the game world

functions.name: SetRelativeLocation
functions.description: Sets this Actor's relative location in local space (only if this actor is attached)

functions.name: SetRelativeRotation
functions.description: Sets this Actor's relative rotation in local space (only if this actor is attached)

functions.name: SetScale
functions.description: Sets this Actor's scale

functions.name: SetNetworkAuthority
functions.description: Sets the Player to have network authority over this Actor
functions.description_long:
Sets the Player to have network authority over this Actor. This Player will be manually assigned to handle this Actor's physics and share its location with other clients. The authority assignment will still be overridden by the game automatically

Please refer to Network Authority for more information

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: New player which will assume the Network Authority of this Actor

functions.name: SetNetworkAuthorityAutoDistributed
functions.description: Sets if this Actor will auto distribute the network authority between players
functions.description_long:
Sets if this Actor will auto distribute the network authority between players when idle

Please refer to Network Authority for more information

parameters.name: auto_distribute
parameters.description: If this Actor will be auto network distributed

functions.name: TranslateTo
functions.description: Smoothly moves this actor to a location over a certain time

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Time to interpolate from current location to target location

parameters.name: exp
parameters.description: Exponent used to smooth interpolation. Use 0 for linear movement

functions.name: RotateTo
functions.description: Smoothly rotates this actor to an angle over a certain time

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Time to interpolate from current location to target location

parameters.name: exp
parameters.description: Exponent used to smooth interpolation. Use 0 for linear movement

functions.name: IsBeingDestroyed
functions.description: Returns true if this Actor is being destroyed
functions.description_long:
Returns true if this Actor is being destroyed.
You can check this inside events like Drop to see if a Pickable is being dropped because it's going to be destroyed

functions.name: IsVisible
functions.description: Returns true if this Actor is visible

functions.name: IsGravityEnabled
functions.description: Returns true if gravity is enabled on this Actor

functions.name: IsInWater
functions.description: Returns true if this Actor is in water

functions.name: IsNetworkDistributed
functions.description: Returns true if this Actor is currently network distributed
functions.description_long:
Returns true if this Actor is currently network distributed. Only actors being network distributed can have their network authority set
Entities have NetworkDistributed automatically disabled when: Attached, Possessed, Grabbed, Picked Up or Driving

functions.name: GetAttachedEntities
functions.description: Gets all Actors attached to this Actor

functions.name: GetAttachedTo
functions.description: Gets the Actor this Actor is attached to

functions.name: GetBounds
functions.description: Gets this Actor's bounds

functions.name: GetCollision
functions.description: Gets this Actor's collision type

functions.name: GetLocation
functions.description: Gets this Actor's location in the game world

functions.name: GetRelativeLocation
functions.description: Gets this Actor's Relative Location if it's attached

functions.name: GetNetworkAuthority
functions.description: Gets this Actor's Network Authority Player

functions.name: GetRotation
functions.description: Gets this Actor's angle in the game world

functions.name: GetRelativeRotation
functions.description: Gets this Actor's Relative Rotation if it's attached

functions.name: GetForce
functions.description: Gets this Actor's force (set by SetForce())

functions.name: GetDimension
functions.description: Gets this Actor's dimension

functions.name: HasNetworkAuthority
functions.description: Returns true if the local Player is currently the Network Authority of this Actor

functions.name: HasAuthority
functions.description: Gets if this Actor was spawned by the client side

return.description: false if it was spawned by the Server or true if it was spawned by the client

functions.name: GetScale
functions.description: Gets this Actor's scale

functions.name: GetVelocity
functions.description: Gets this Actor's current velocity

functions.name: AddActorTag
functions.description: Adds an Unreal Actor Tag to this Actor

functions.name: RemoveActorTag
functions.description: Removes an Unreal Actor Tag from this Actor

functions.name: GetActorTags
functions.description: Gets all Unreal Actor Tags on this Actor

functions.name: WasRecentlyRendered
functions.description: Gets if this Actor was recently rendered on screen

functions.name: GetDistanceFromCamera
functions.description: Gets the distance of this Actor from the Camera

functions.name: GetScreenPercentage
functions.description: Gets the percentage of this Actor size in the screen

events.name: DimensionChange
events.description: Triggered when an Actor changes it's dimension
